changeSet.sql: create table need ( id bigint auto_increment primary key, active boolean default 1, need_date datetime, need_expiration_date datetime, title varchar(250), description varchar(500), category varchar(100), communication_method varchar(100), status varchar(100), city_id bigint, user_id bigint, foreign key (city_id) references city (id), foreign key (user_id) references user_ (id) );
